post.description: sq5bpf/etherify: Etherify - bringing the ether back to ethernet
post.extended:
> This works by switching between 10Mbps and 100Mbps, which results in a change of the electromagnetic radiation that leaks from the devices. Switching to 100Mbps produces a signal at 125MHz, which is used to transmit morse code.
https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=25025552

post.description: rileytestut/AltStore: AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken iOS devices.
post.extended:
This alternative app store has existed for over a year, and still works.
https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=25028786
